name: Zombie Friend Adventure
description:
You wake up... Adjust your eyes... And realise you're trapped with some strange zombie girl. And she won't let you escape until you've passed her test... her.... 'friendship' test...
But it's just a simple test. You'll be fine.
….If you pass it, of course.

This game has 7 total endings, if you want all possible endings, the game is around 1 hour long.
